name: transitdata-partial-apc-expander-combiner
description: Expand partial APC messages with trip metadata and combine them by stops to create full APC messages

scripts.build: npm run build:protos && npm run build:src
scripts.build:protos: npm run build:mqtt && npm run build:hfp && npm run build:passenger-count
scripts.build:mqtt: mkdir -p ./src/protobuf && rm -f ./src/protobuf/mqtt.* && pbjs --target static-module --wrap es6 --out ./src/protobuf/mqtt.js ./protos/mqtt.proto && pbjs --target static-module --wrap es6 ./protos/mqtt.proto | pbts --out ./src/protobuf/mqtt.d.ts - && prettier --write ./src/protobuf/mqtt.{js,d.ts}
scripts.build:hfp: mkdir -p ./src/protobuf && rm -f ./src/protobuf/hfp.* && pbjs --target static-module --wrap es6 --out ./src/protobuf/hfp.js ./protos/hfp.proto && pbjs --target static-module --wrap es6 ./protos/hfp.proto | pbts --out ./src/protobuf/hfp.d.ts - && prettier --write ./src/protobuf/hfp.{js,d.ts}
scripts.build:passenger-count: mkdir -p ./src/protobuf && rm -f ./src/protobuf/passengerCount.* && pbjs --target static-module --wrap es6 --out ./src/protobuf/passengerCount.js ./protos/passenger-count.proto && pbjs --target static-module --wrap es6 ./protos/passenger-count.proto | pbts --out ./src/protobuf/passengerCount.d.ts - && prettier --write ./src/protobuf/passengerCount.{js,d.ts}
scripts.check-and-build: npm run build:protos && npm run ts:check && npm run prettier:check && npm run eslint && npm run test && npm run build

author: haphut <haphut@mistmap.com>
